title: A new plot discovered, practised by an assembly of papists, upon Sunday being the 25. day of Iuly, for the deliverance of William Waller, alias Walker, alias Ward, alias Slater, a Jesuite, which was hang'd, drawn, and quartered, upon Monday the 26 of July, revealed by John Hodgskins a porter, by a letter, 1641.
author: Hodgskins, John.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
